snippet: A construction worker died on Monday after he fell onto scaffolding at an office building near Pennsylvania Station in Midtown Manhattan, the police said.
abstract: Construction worker dies after falling onto scaffolding at office building near Pennsylvania Station in Midtown Manhattan; police say man has not been positively identified.
lead_paragraph: A construction worker died on Monday after he fell onto scaffolding at an office building near Pennsylvania Station in Midtown Manhattan, the police said.

headline.main: Worker Dies After Falling From Building
headline.print_headline: Worker Dies After Falling From Building
